# Miro Changelog

## 0.4.0

* Enhancements
  * Jruby Support [#24][]
  * Add support for file paths with spaces in the name [#28][]
  * Updated README

## 0.3.0

* Enhancements
  * new `:histogram` option for improved performance [#19][]
  * Updated README
